original_title: Mimi Carina: Emilie au pays des morts
overview: A dream to fly turns dangerous as our young heroine is dragged into a new world only to be saved by a kindly witch. One of the winners of the “Next Genius” promotional contest run by Studio 4°C on MySpace for the release of the anime compilation film, Genius Party (2007).
title: Mimi Carina: Emilie au pays des morts
